item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Lead Market Trends
item.description: As the Sep-2025 quarter earnings season concludes with 3,990 companies reporting, the market reveals a nuanced picture of corporate performance across sectors and market capitalisations. Positive results were recorded by 43.0% of companies, marking a slight rise from 40.0% in the previous quarter, reflecting a cautious but steady trend in earnings growth. Large caps, mid caps and small caps displayed varied outcomes, with mid caps showing the highest proportion of positive results at 50.0%. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Orissa Minerals and Market Trends for Sep 2025
item.description: As the Sep-2025 quarter earnings season concludes with 3,990 companies reporting, the market reveals a nuanced picture of corporate performance across sectors and market capitalisations. Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, and Orissa Minerals Development Company Ltd stand out among the top performers, while overall positive result proportions show subtle shifts compared to previous quarters. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Sanghvi Movers Sees Revision in Market Evaluation Amid Mixed Financial Signals
item.description: Sanghvi Movers, a small-cap player in the automobile sector, has experienced a revision in its market evaluation reflecting a nuanced view of its recent financial and technical performance. This shift comes amid a backdrop of mixed operational results and fluctuating stock returns, prompting a reassessment of the company’s standing within its sector. Time: 7 hours ago

item.title: Ugro Capital Sees Revision in Market Evaluation Amid Mixed Financial Signals
item.description: Ugro Capital, a small-cap player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, has recently undergone a revision in its market evaluation metrics. This shift reflects nuanced changes across several key analytical parameters, including quality, valuation, financial trends, and technical outlook, providing investors with a refreshed perspective on the stock’s current standing. Time: 7 hours ago

item.title: BLS E-Services Sees Revision in Market Assessment Amid Positive Financial Trends
item.description: BLS E-Services has experienced a revision in its market evaluation, reflecting a more favourable analytical perspective driven by recent financial performance and market dynamics. This shift highlights the company’s evolving position within the Computers - Software & Consulting sector and offers investors a refreshed outlook on its prospects. Time: 7 hours ago
